entry.title: Scotland's rustiness was to be expected - now race against time is on ahead of crucial Spain clash
entry.summary: The announcement of a new contract for Steve Clarke 24 hours earlier was not a case of tempting fate, mercifully. Neither was there any reason for the SFA lawyers to scour the small print of the manager’s new deal in search of a get-out clause as Scotland secured an ultimately commanding victory over Cyprus.
